txt.en:
You hand Kavíra the pristine bog-lurker carapaces you have collected.

'Your assistance is a boon to our efforts, [placeholder]. I do not see carapaces from bog-lurkers in this pristine a condition often. I can surely find a good use for them down here. Please accept this for your trouble.

'If you happen upon any more I will be glad to take them off your hands.'
Bog-lurkers can be found in the area.\n\nCollect pristine carapaces from them and bring it to Kavíra in Jadambor.
You have gathered pristine carapaces from the bog-lurkers in the area. Kavíra, the healer in Jadambor would have use of these.
You found a pristine bog-lurker carapace.
Bring the pristine bog-lurker carapaces to Kavíra in Jadambor in western Dil-irmíz.
You found a pristine bog-lurker carapace
Bring the pristine bog-lurker carapaces to Kavíra in Jadambor
Carapaces from bog-lurkers in pristine condition can be quite rare. Bring some to Kavíra, the healer in Jadambor, as she will have use of them.
Collect pristine bog-lurker carapaces in Dil-irmíz ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bog-lurkers can be found throughout western Dil-irmíz. Kavíra, the healer in Jadambor, can make use of them if they are in a pristine condition.
Your assistance is a boon to our efforts
